## pipes

- **|** - channels the output of one command as input to another

```
<command one> | <command two>
```

![](img/grep4.PNG){width=600}

![](img/pipe.PNG){width=800}


## redirects

- **>** - directs the output of a command to a file, overwrites
- **>>** - directs the output of a command to a file, appending

```
<command> > <output file>
```

![](img/grep.PNG){width=500}

![](img/redirect.PNG){width=800}

- **>** - directs the output of a command to a file, overwrites
- **>>** - directs the output of a command to a file, appending
